Name: jiang can
僵蠶
Biological: Bombyx mori L., (infected with Beauveria bassiana Bals.)

Medical Function: anti-convulsion
antibiotic
hypnotic effect (observed in lab animal studies)
inhibitory effect against convulsions caused by strychnine (observed in lab animal studies)
Dosage: For decoction: 5～9 g. For taking in powder form: 1 to 1.5 g.
Samples of Formulae: Xing Pi San: spleen deficient children with diarrhea, chronic epilepsy. It is appropriate to combine jiang can (stiff silkworm) with dang shen (codonopsis root), bai zhu (white atractylodes rhizome), tian ma (gastrodia rhizome), quan xie (scorpion), herbs that help correct qixu (qi deficient), pixu (spleen deficient) and herbs for calming and stopping epilepsy.
Contraindications: This herb antagonizes jie geng, fu ling, bei xie, sang piao xiao.
Research: In lab animal studies, jiang can showed a strong hypnotic effect and also showed an inhibitory effect against convulsions cause by strychnine.
Notes: can yong (pupae of silkworm): being used in treatment of tuberculosis, children malnutrition due to parasites, fever, round worms, diabetes.

It is appropriate to combine jiang can with dang shen, bai zhu, tian ma, quan xie, herbs that help correctqixu (qi deficient), pixu (spleen deficient) and herbs for calming and stopping epilepsy.醒脾散《古今醫統》：治小兒脾虛久瀉，慢驚搐搦者，又當與黨 參，白朮，天麻，全蠍等 改善氣虛， 脾虛，息風定驚藥配伍。Modern Research:現代研究﹕In lab animal studies, jiang can showed a strong hypnotic effect and also showed an inhibitory effect against convulsions cause by strychnine.在實驗室內研究，僵蠶對動物有催眠作用；并且對番木鱉鹼所致的驚厥有抑制作用。Toxicity & Cautions:毒素與禁忌﹕this herb antagonizes jie geng, fu ling , bei xie, sang piao xiao.反  桔 梗， 茯 苓，萆 薢，桑螵蛸。can yong (pupae of silkworm): being used in treatment of tuberculosis, children malnutrition due to parasites, fever, round worms, diabetes.蠶蛹：用於治療肺癆，小兒疳積，發熱，蛔虫病，消渴。Search this siteProblems with website? Name: feng wei cao
鳳尾草
Other name: jing kou bian cao (井口邊草)
jing bian feng wei (井邊鳳尾)

Maladies Treated: External application: swelling in the breasts
External application: different types of sores
Medical Function: Getting rid of infection
Clears heat and toxin (清熱解毒).
Strengthens the sinews and promotes flow in the collaterals (強筋活絡).
Cools blood and arrests bleeding (涼血止血).
Reduces swelling and stops pain (消腫止痛).

Antibiotics effects (in vitro): inhibitory effect on Staphylococcus aureus, Escherichia coli, Shigella, Mycobacterium tuberculosis; 50% decoction by trenching method and plate disk diffusion method shows inhibitory effect on Staphylococcus aureus, Shigella flexneri, Salmonella typhi; 25% concentration shows no effect on Freund Shigella and SHU Shigella. [1]
Anti-tumor: alcohol extract of whole herb or roots shows inhibitory effect against mouse S180 sarcoma; intraperitoneal injection; inhibitory rates 3%–33% and 33%–40%.
Anti-hyperlipidemic (rats): reduces cholesterol and triglyceride; increases excretion of lipids and metabolic by-products via the intestinal tract. [1]
Dosage: Decoction: 15–30 g. External application: appropriate amount.
Contraindications: Do not use in cases of chronic diarrhea and in elderly with weak constitution. Traditional oral administration, when properly utilized, can avoid toxic risk. [3]
Research:
antibiotics effects: with decoction of 25% concentration, there is no effect on Freund Shigella and SHU Shigella (in vitro). There was inhibitory effect on Staphylococcus aureus, Escherichia coli, Shigella, Mycobacterium tuberculosis inhibit. The 50% decoction of trenching method and by plate disk diffusion method shows inhibitory effect on Staphylococcus aureus, Shigella flexneri, Salmonella typhi. [1]

anti-tumors: alcohol extract of the whole herb or roots possesses inhibitory effect on S180 fibroids of mice. Its inhibitory effects are 3%-33% and 33%-40%. Intraperitoneal injection.

anti-hyperlipidemic effect: caused reduction in cholesterol and triglyceride. It also could increase the excretion of lipids and metabolic by-products via the intestinal tract of lab rats..[1]

"A new C(14) pterosin sesquiterpenoid, named (2R)-pterosin P (1), and a new natural product, named dehydropterosin B (3), were isolated from the aerial parts of Pteris multifida Poir., along with nine known compounds ( 2, 4-11). By chiral HPLC, compounds 1 and 2 were isolated as a pair of enantiomeric pterosin sesquiterpenoids. The planar structure of 1 was elucidated on the basis of NMR spectroscopy analysis, and the absolute configuration was established by the CD spectrum. In addition, the absolute structure of 1 was further confirmed by single-crystal X-ray diffraction (CuK α). Compounds 3, 5, and 6 showed potent cytotoxicity against PANC-1 (human pancreatic cancer) and NCI-H446 (human small-cell lung cancer) cell lines, with IC(50) values in the range of 4.27-14.63 然". [2]
Notes:
Habitat: found below 800 m, usually around old shady walls and masonry cracks, around cemeteries, dumps, and towns.

Actions & Indications list attributed to: Commonly Used Herb of Shanghai.
References: [3] Food and Chemical Toxicology Volume 45, Issue 9, September 2007, Pages 1757-1763
Zhong Hua Ben Cao (中華本草)

  bongmichoPron. in Cantonese::粵音﹕fung6 mei5 cou2Other Names:別名﹕ji jiao cao (chicken leg grass) 雞腳草，jin ji wei (golden chicken tail) 金雞尾，jing kou bian cao (well side grass) 井口邊草，jing bian feng wei (phoenix tail of well side) 井邊鳳尾，jing lan cao (fence of well grass) 井欄 草，feng wei jue (phoenix tail fern) 鳳尾蕨，wu zhi cao (five finger grass) 五指草，tie jiao ji (iron legged chicken) 鐵脚雞，bai jiao ji (hundred legged chichen) 百脚雞。Common Name:英文名﹕spider brake Chinese brake fernDistribution:產地﹕eastern part, middle southern part, western southern part of China, and in Shanxi, Shaanxi provinces. Being found in areas 800 meters below sea level, usually around old shady walls and masonry cracks, around cemeteries, dumps, and towns.分佈於華東、中南、西南、及山西、陝西等地。生於海拔800m以 下的石灰岩縫內或牆縫，墓地，陰暗井邊。Properties(characteristics)﹕性味﹕bland, slightly bitter, cold.淡，微苦，寒。Channels (meridians) entered: 歸經﹕large intestine, heart, liver, stomach, kidney.大腸，心，肝，胃，腎。Medical functions:藥理﹕ antibiotics effects: with decoction  of 25% concentration, there is no effect on Freund Shigella  and SHU Shigella  (in vitro). There was inhibitory effect on Staphylococcus aureus, Escherichia coli, Shigella, Mycobacterium tuberculosis inhibit. The 50% decoction of trenching method and by plate disk diffusion method shows inhibitory effect on Staphylococcus aureus, Shigella flexneri, Salmonella typhi. anti-tumors: alcohol extract of the whole herb or roots possesses inhibitory effect on S180 fibroids of mice. Its inhibitory effects are 3%-33% and 33%-40% anti-hyperlipidemic effect: caused reduction in cholesterol and triglyceride. It also could increase the excretion of lipids and metabolic by-products via the intestinal tract of lab rats..[1]1.抗菌：煎劑在25%濃度時對弗氏及舒氏痢疾杆菌均無抑菌作用（體外試驗）。對金黃色葡萄球菌，大腸杆菌，痢疾杆菌，結核杆菌均有抑制作用。50%煎 劑用平板挖溝法和紙片法，對金黃色葡萄球菌，福氏痢疾杆菌，傷寒杆菌有抑制作用。 2.抗腫瘤作用： 全草或根醇浸出液，腹腔注射，對小鼠肉瘤S180有抑制作用，其抑制率分別為3%-33%和33%-40%。3. 抗高血脂：喂食鳳尾草之大鼠可降低它們的膽固醇與三酸甘油酯并能經消化道排出脂質與其新成代謝廢物。【1】Actions & Indications:主治﹕For getting rid of infection, strengthening and loosening muscles, cooling blood and arresting bleeding, reducing swelling and stopping pain.Being used in treatment of: dysentery, diarrhea, vomiting blood, hepatitis, leukorrhea, tumors in intestine, lung and bladder,  cancers of gynecology, injuries from impact. External application: swelling in the breasts, different types of sores.Hepatitis with jaundice, toncillitis, spermatorrhea, enterobiasis. （source: Commonly Used Herb of Shanghai)清熱解毒，強筋活絡，涼血止血，消腫止痛，治痢疾，腹瀉，吐血，肝炎，白帶，腸癌，肺癌，膀胱癌及婦科惡性腫瘤，跌打及外敷乳房紅腫和各種瘡瘍等。黄疸型肝炎，扁桃體炎，遺精，蟯虫病。《上海常用中草药》Chemical ingredients:化學成份﹕ portion above ground contains:地上部含：pterosin B,C,F,O,S蕨素B，C，F，O，Spterosin C-3-O-β-D-glucoside蕨素 C-3-O-葡萄糖甙2β,15α-dihydroxy-ent-kaur- 16-ene2β，15α-二羥基-對映-16-貝殼杉-烯2β,16α-dihydroxy-ent-kaurane2β，16α-二羥基-對映-貝殼杉烷creticoside A, B大葉鳳尾甙（A，Bapigenin-7-O-β-D-glucoside芹菜素-7-O-葡萄糖甙luteolin-7-O-β-D-glucoside木犀草素-7-O-葡萄糖甙tannin鞣質Daily Dosage:每日用量﹕For decoction: 15 to 30 g. By chiral HPLC, compounds 1 and 2 were isolated as a pair of enantiomeric pterosin sesquiterpenoids. The planar structure of 1 was elucidated on the basis of NMR spectroscopy analysis, and the absolute configuration was established by the CD spectrum. In addition, the absolute structure of 1 was further confirmed by single-crystal X-ray diffraction (CuK α). Compounds 3, 5, and 6 showed potent cytotoxicity against PANC-1 (human pancreatic cancer) and NCI-H446 (human small-cell lung cancer) cell lines, with IC(50) values in the range of 4.27-14.63 然".[2]Toxicity & Cautions:毒素與禁忌﹕Do not use in cases of chronic diarrhea and in old people with weak body. Traditional oral administration, when properly utilized. can avoid of any toxic risk. Medical Function: arrests bleeding
arrests swelling
promotes tissue regeneration (生肌)
inhibits tubercle bacillus (抑制結核桿菌作用)
inhibits fungi (抑制真菌作用)
inhibits tumor cells (抑制腫瘤細胞作用)

Bibenzyl_Compounds: [3,3'-dihydroxy-2',6'-bis(p-hydroxybenzyl)-5-methoxy bibenzyl] (3,3'-二羥基-2',6'-雙（對-羥苄基）-5-甲氧基聯苄)
[2,6-bis(p-hydroxybenzyl)-3',5-dimethoxy-3-hydroxybibenzyl] (2,6-雙（對-羥苄基）-3',5-二甲氧基-3-羥基聯苄)
[3,3'-dihydroxy-5-methoxy-2,5',6-tris(p-hydroxybenzyl)bibenzyl] (3,3'-二羥基-5-甲氧基-2,5',6-三（對-羥苄基）聯苄)
Phenanthrene_Compounds: 4,7-dihydroxy-1-p-hydroxybenzyl-2-methoxy-9,10-dihydrophenanthrene (4,7-二羥基-1-對-羥苄基-2-甲氧基-9,10-二氫菲)
p-hydroxybenzyl-4-methoxy-9,10-dihydrophenanthrene-2,7-diol (3-（對-羥苄基）-4-甲氧基-9,10-二氫菲-2,7-二醇)
[1,6-bis(p-hydroxybenzyl)-4-methoxy-9,10-dihydrophenanthrene-2,7-diol] (1,6-雙（對-羥苄基）-4-甲氧基-9,10-二氫菲-2,7-二醇)
Diphenylanthrene_Compounds: Blestriarene A, B, C (白及聯菲 A、B、C)
Blestrianol A, B, C (白及聯菲醇 A、B、C)
Diphenyl_Ether_Compounds: Blestrin A, B, CD (白及雙菲醚 A、B、CD)
Dihydrophenanthrene_and_Pyran_Compounds: Bletlol A, B, C (白芨二氫菲並吡喃酚 A、B、C)
Phenanthrene_Glucosides: 2,7-dihydroxy-4-methoxyphenanthrene-2,7-O-diglucoside (2,7-二羥基-4-甲氧基菲-2,7-O-二葡萄糖甙)
3,7-dihycroxy-2,4-dimethoxyphenanthrene-3-O-glucoside (3,7-二羥基-2,4-二甲氧基菲-3-O-葡萄糖甙)
[2,7-dihydroxy-1-(4'-hydroxybenzyl)-9,10-dihydrophenanthrene-4-glucoside] (2,7-二羥基-1-(4'-羥苄基)-9,10-二氫菲-4-O-葡萄糖甙)
Fresh_Rhizome_Contents: Bletillamannan, composed of 4 parts mannose and 1 part glucose (甘露聚糖，是由4份甘露糖和1份葡萄糖組成)

Maladies Treated: insomnia due to vexation of the Heart (心煩不得眠)
heat disease with spasm (熱病痙厥); high fever
consumptive disorder with hemoptysis (虛勞吐血)
heat sores or herpes simplex I of little children, by external application of Luan Fa Ji Zi Gao (亂髮雞子膏)
Medical Function: Enriches Yin and moistens dryness (滋陰潤燥)
Corrects yinxu with fire condition (改善 陰虚火旺徵狀)
Nourishes blood and extinguishes wind (養血息風)
The lecithin, triglycerides, and cholesterol of egg yolk play a significant role in physical development of the nervous system.
Lecithin after digestion releases choline; choline may improve memory in all age groups.
Dosage: Internal (oral): cook 1–3 pieces, or take raw. External: use appropriate amount and apply on affected area.
Samples of Formulae:
Name of formula: Luan Fa Ji Zi Gao (亂髮雞子膏) [Source: Liu Yuxi, Zhuan Xin Fang].
Application: heat sores or herpes simplex I of little children.
Prescription and preparation: Egg yolks 5 pieces (remove the white and take only the yolk), human hair a handful the size of an egg. Place the two items together in an iron frying pan over charcoal fire and heat; at first it is very dry, after a while it becomes scorched and liquid will come out (fat from egg yolk). Immediately transfer to a china bowl, taking it out when the liquid is exhausted. Smear the liquid on the boils, then sprinkle Ku Shen (Sophora flavescens root) powder over it.
Contraindications: Use with care in cases of coronary heart disease, hypertension, and arterial atherosclerosis.

Proteins and related: Vitellin and egg yolk immunoglobulin; ratio approximately 3.6:1
Lipids and fatty acids: Egg yolk contains a lot of fatty substances (egg white contains only about 0.1%)
Approximately 10% of egg yolk lipids are phospholipids; lecithin is the main ingredient
Vitellin in egg yolk is combined with lecithin
Fatty acids mainly: oleic acid 46.7% of fatty acids; linoleic acid 19%; linolenic acid 2.9%; saturated acids 31.4%
Pigments: Contains a variety of lutein and lutein isomers
Contains a small amount of carotene
Feed can affect the color of egg yolk; egg yolk also contains various other pigments
USDA data (as presented): Proximates value per 100g per cup 243g large 17g
National Nutrient Database for Standard Reference Release 25   Software v.1.2.2

References: National Nutrient Database for Standard Reference Release 25   Software v.1.2.2
Zhuan Xin Fang (傳信方), Liu Yuxi — source of the formula 'Luan Fa Ji Zi Gao (亂髮雞子膏)'.
Original Text: ji zi huang, Complementary and Alternative Healing University     現代中藥辭典Complementary and Alternative Healing University   中藥詞典                 Chinese Herb Dictionary      Search this site     在本網站找資料     Discussion FormSearch this siteList of Health ProblemsChinese Herb DictionaryQigongTraditional Chinese Medicine (TCM)AcupuncturePrescribed Drug DictionaryBiochemistry DictionaryLecture SlidesResearch LibrarianGeneral Online LibraryResearch SitesViagraMassage/AcupressureHypnotherapyTell us what you wantNotify Changes & New Information  ji zi huang  雞子黃 （in English and Chinese 中英文)Translated by: Joe Hing Kwok Chu 朱興國編譯 Pharmaceutical name:英文藥名﹕Galli Gigeriae VitellusBotanical name:拉丁生物學名﹕Gallus gallus Domesticus Braisson (Phasianidae)Pron. in Japanese:日語發音﹕Niwatori ran'ōPron. in Korean:韓語發音﹕gyejahwangPron. in Cantonese:粵音﹕gai1 zi2 wong4Other Names:別名﹕ji luan huang 雞卵黃，ji dan huang 雞蛋黃。Common Name:英文名﹕chicken egg yolkDistribution:產地﹕ Properties(characteristics)﹕性味﹕sweet, neutral.甘，平。Channels (meridians) entered: 歸經﹕heart, kidney, spleen.心，腎，脾。Medical functions:藥理﹕ The lecithin, triglycerides, and cholesterol of egg yolk, plays a significant role in physical development of the nervous system . The lecithin after digested by the body, releases choline. Choline may improve memory in all age groups. 雞蛋黃中的卵磷脂、甘油三脂、膽固醇和卵黃素，對神經系統和身體發育有很大的作用。卵磷脂被人體消化後，可釋放出膽碱，膽碱可改善各個年齡組的記憶力。Actions & Indications:主治﹕To promote yin of the body and cut down heat （Corrects yinxu with fire condition) For treatment of insomnia, high fever, consumptive vomiting blood, vomiting, diarrhea, bleeding during pregnancy, burns, heat sores, eczema, infantile indigestion.滋陰潤燥, 改善 陰虚火旺徵狀，養血息風。治心煩不得眠，熱病痙厥，虛勞吐血，嘔逆，下痢，胎漏下血，燙傷，熱瘡，濕疹，小兒消化不良。Chemical ingredients:化學成份﹕Per 100 grams of egg yolk contains: 13.6 grams of protein, 30 grams of lipids, 1 g of carbohydrate , 1.6 g of ash; 134 mg of calcium  532 mg of phosphorus , 7 mg of iron; A3500 international units of vitamin, 0.27 mg of thiamin  , 0.35 mg of riboflavin  , trace amount of niacin , 0.8 ug / g of p-aminobenzoic acid (dried egg yolk)  The proteins contains vitellin, eggyolk-immunoglobulin, ratio of approximately 3.6:1. Also contains at least 5 kinds of asialoglycoprotein.  Chicken egg yolk contains a lot of fatty substances (egg white contains only about 0.1%), of which approximately 10% are phospholipids, and in phospholipid, lecithin is the main ingredient. The egg yolk is the combination of vitellin and lecithin. The fatty acids in the fatty substances , are mainly oleic acid ( accounted for 46.7% of fatty acids), linoleic acid (19%), linolenic acid (2.9%), unsaturated acid (31.4%). Egg yolk contains approximately 1.3% cholesterol, glucose (as compound and in free form) of approximately 0.3%.  Also contains a variety of lutein and lutein isomers also contain a small amount of carotene. Feed can affect the result of the color of egg yolk; so the egg yolk certainly also contain other various pigments.  每100克含蛋白質13.6克，脂類30克，碳水化物1克，灰分1.6克；鈣134毫克，磷532毫 克，鐵7毫克；維生素A3500國際單位，硫胺素0.27毫克，核黃素0.35毫克，尼克酸微量，對氨基苯甲酸（乾燥卵黃）0.8微克／克。  蛋白質有卵黃磷蛋白、卵黃球蛋白，其含率比約為3.6：1。還含至少5種唾液酸糖蛋白。  雞子黃含大量脂肪性物質（雞子白只含約0.1％），其中約10％是磷脂，而磷脂中又以卵磷脂為主；上述卵黃磷蛋白，在雞子黃中就是與卵磷脂相結合的。脂肪性物質中的脂肪酸，主要是油酸（佔脂肪酸46.7％）、亞油酸（19％）、亞麻酸（2.9％）、飽和酸（31.4％）。又雞子黃含膽甾醇約1.3％，葡萄糖（化合及游離）約0.3％。  還含葉黃素和葉黃素的多種異構物，也含少量胡蘿卜素。因飼料能影響蛋黃的顏色，肯定蛋黃還含其它種種色素。 The following is from U.S.D.A. 以下來至美國農業部資料:Proximates大若 value per 100g每100克per cup 243g每杯243克large Reference Release 25   Software v.1.2.2Daly Dosage:每日用量﹕For oral consumption：cook 1 to 3 pieces, or taken raw.External application: use appropriate amount and apply on affected area.內服：煮食，1-3枚；或生服。外用；適量，塗敷Samples of formulae:處方舉例﹕Name of formula:Luan Fa Ji Zi Gao (Source: Zhuan Xin Fang)Application: heat sores or herpes simplex I of little childrenPrescription: egg yolks 5 pieces, human hair a handful like size of an egg.Place the 2 items on an iron frying pan and heat. At first it seems very dry. After a while liquid will come out (fat from egg yolk). Then put into a china bowl. Smear on the boils, sprinkle ku shen powder over it.藥方名：亂髮雞子膏 （劉禹錫《傳信方》治孩子熱瘡。處方：雞子五枚（去白取黃），亂髮如雞子許大。二味相和於鐵銚子中，炭火熬，初甚干，少頃即發焦，遂有液出(蛋黃的脂肪)，旋取置一瓷碗中，以液盡為度，取塗熱瘡上，即以苦參末粉之。 Modern Research:現代研究﹕ Toxicity & Cautions:毒素與禁忌﹕Use with care in cases of coronary heart disease, hypertension, arterial atherosclerosis有冠心病，高血壓，動脈血管粥樣硬化者慎用。      Search this siteProblems with website? Geography: Worldwide: all parts of the warm areas of the world
China: Zhejiang (called nan xiang fu; considered better quality)
Medical Function: Regulates qi and relieves constraint (理氣解郁); regulates menses and stops pain (調經止痛).
Improves mood and rid of depression
Antibiotic
Anti-inflammation
Anti-pyretic
Lowers blood pressure
Anesthetic
Inhibits contraction of uterus
The oily part possesses estrogen effect
Inhibits HBV [2]
Dosage: 6–9 g for decoction; may also be made into pills or powder (丸散).
Samples of Formulae:
1) For pain during menses: Xiang Fu (Cyperus rhizome) 12 g, Yi Mu Cao (Motherwort herb) 12 g, Dan Shen (Salvia root) 15 g, Bai Shao (White peony root) 10 g. Make into decoction with water. One prescription a day, divided into 2 servings. Start 3–5 days before menses.

2) For flatulence, pain in rib cage area, fever and chill, chronic hepatitis, gall bladder diseases, chronic enteritis, ulcer, or cystic mastitis; and for intercostal neuralgia, gastric neurosis, mammary lobular hyperplasia and cystic hyperplasia: Chai Hu Shu Gan Tang (Bupleurum Liver-Coursing Decoction).
Contraindications: Not to use by itself in cases of xue xu (blood deficient) or qi xu (qi deficient). Use with care in cases of yinxu (yin deficient) and/or xue re (heat in blood) condition. Those with menses that come early can be heat in blood; do not use this herb. [1]

Volatile oils (China): Patchoulenone (廣藿香酮; 異香附酮)
After hydrolysis: Sugenol (蘇根醇; exists in plant as acetate)

References: [1] 中華人民共和國國家藥典委員會，中華人民共和國藥典ㄧ部 (2005) ，化學工業出版社

Those produced in Shandong is called dong xiang fu and those produced Zhejiang is called nan xiang fu (south xiang fu), which is deemed to be better quality.分佈於世界各 溫暖地 區。 主產於山東﹐浙江﹐湖南﹐河南等地區。產于山東的稱東香附﹐產于浙江的稱南香附; 一般認為品質較佳。Properties(characteristics)﹕性味﹕acrid, mildly bitter, neutral味辛，甘﹐微 苦，性 平Medical functions:藥理﹕Medical functions:antibioticanti-inflammationanti-pyreticlowers blood pressureanestheticinhibits contraction of uterusthe oily part possesses estrogen effectinhibits HBV [2]藥理﹕抗菌﹐抗炎﹐解熱﹐降血壓﹐鎮痛﹐抑制子宮收縮等作用，所含的油有微弱的雌激素樣作用抗乙型肝炎病毒 [2] Channels (meridians) entered:歸經﹕liver, triple burners (san jiao)肝﹐三焦經。Actions & Indications:主 治﹕Improves mood and rid of depression, regulates menses and rid of pain, for ulcers, weak digestion, flatulence with pain, irregular menses.理氣解郁，調 經止痛 。治胃痛，消化不良，胃腹脹痛，月經不 調。Chemical ingredients:化學成份﹕ Rhizome contains:根莖含Glucose  8.3%-9.1%葡萄糖 8.3%-9.1%Fructose 1.0%-1.7%果糖 1.0%-1.7%Starch 40%-41.1%澱粉 40%-41.1%Xiang fu produced in China contains evaporating oils of:中國產香附揮發油含Cyperene香附烯β-Sclieneβ-芹子烯α-Cyperoneα-香附酮β- Cypereneβ-香附酮Patchoulenone廣藿香酮(異香附酮)Small amount of monoterpenes:少量單萜化合物：Limonene檸檬烯1,8-Cineol1,8-桉油素β-Pineneβ-蒎烯P-Cymene對-聚傘花素Camphene樟烯Xiang fu produced in Japan contains evaporationg oils of:日本產香附揮發油含：Cyperene香附烯α-Cyperoneα-香附酮Cyperotundone香附酮Cyperolone香附醇酮Cyperol香附醇Isocyperol異香附醇Sugenolacetate蘇根醇乙酯After hydrolysis, it produces:水解後，產生：Sugenol蘇根醇(在植物中以乙酸酯狀態存在)α-Rotunolα-莎草醇β-Rotunolβ-莎草醇Xiang fu produced in India contains evaporating oils of:印度產香附揮發油含Copadiene二烯Epoxyguaiene環氧愈創烯Rotundone莎草薁酮Cyperolone香附醇酮Dosage:用量﹕6-9 g for decoction or make into pills or powder.6~9 克，煎湯。亦可入丸散。Samples of formulae:處方舉例﹕1. For pain during menses: xiang fu 12 g, yi mu cao 12 g, dan shen 15 g, bai shao 10 g. Make into decoction with water. One prescription a day. Make into 2 servings. Start using 3 ~ 5 days before menses.2. For flatulence, pain in rib cage area, fever and chill, chronic hepatitis, gall bladder diseases, chronic entertitis, ulcer, or cystic mastitis:    chai hu shu gan tang1. 治經痛 ：香附12克 ﹐益母草12克﹐丹 参15克 ﹐白芍10克 ，水煎服，於經前3～5天開始服用。每日1劑，早晚各服1次 。2. 治慢 性肝炎、 膽病、慢性胃炎、潰瘍病、肋間神經痛、胃神經官能症、乳腺小葉增生和囊性增生病﹕柴 胡疏肝湯Modern Research:現 代研究﹕ Cautions:禁 忌﹕Not to use by itself in cases of xue xu (blood deficient)  or qixu (qi deficient). Use care in cases of  yinxu (yin deficient) and/or  xue re (heat in blood) condition. Those with menses that come early can be heat in blood. do not use this herb.血虛,氣虛 者不宜單獨使用。 陰虛, 血 熱 者慎服[1]月經先期者，是血熱。不可用。 [1]中 華人民共和國國家藥典委員會，中華人民共和國藥典ㄧ部 (2005) ，化學工業出版社[2] J Viral Hepat. 2013;20(7):445-452. Search this siteProblems with website?
